Texts.Eng: Keffriders are vital to the defence of our clans. Use the ^orange;Keffrider's Spear ^white;I gave you to ^green;hunt down an Adult Poptop and bring me its ^orange;Grand Monster Bone^white;. Do this, and you'll prove you have the strength of a Keffrider.
Well done, Captain! You have proven your merit and your strength, but there is one more task for you to complete.
